Job Description:
BE (Computers /  IT),  MCA,  M.Sc. or any equivalent degree 

Job Description : 

Ability to understand data relation and able to generated tabular,  matrix,  drilldown representation

Enthusiastic about learning new technologies and concepts with an analytical bent to grasp things easily and quickly

Creating imagination and out of box thinking for visualizing of data 

Able to perform and configure Database and Windows Scheduled Jobs

Good at processing the data from file tipe like XLSX,  CSV,  TDV, XML, JSON & TXT etc 

Good understanding and hands- on QlickSense/ QlickView/ PowerBI/ tableau

knowledge of D3JS/ Jquery/ Angular JS/ PyPlotly etc

Hand on experience on PGSQL/  PostgreSQL (Preferable)/ MS SQL (2014/ 16)/ Oracle/ MySQL Database Development & analysis

Able at writing Stored Procedures,  Functions,  Views when required

Require Skills : 

Love to play with numbers and data

Thinking out of box capability

Self- motivated and directed,  with keen attention to detail

Share and Share A like attitude
